article_title: Colorado Family-Planning Program May Be in Jeopardy
article_text:
DENVER—During the past five years, Colorado’s teen pregnancy rate plummeted 40%, a dramatic reduction that public health officials attribute to an unusual contraception program financed by investor Warren Buffett.

Now the future of the program, which made birth control devices available to thousands of Colorado women at reduced costs, is in jeopardy. It is set to expire this summer and some state lawmakers are balking at using state...

twitter.description: A family-planning program backed by Warren Buffett that made birth control devices available to thousands of Colorado women at reduced costs could lose funding.
twitter.creator: @djfroschWSJ

image.alt: Colorado family-planning program may lose funding and shut down
